name: InShape
description: My first ever Ludum Dare entry, this is a simple game, you select a difficulty out of 4, then select what level you want to play at that difficulty, then you use the number, 8,9,0 to select which shape to change, and use the numbers 1,2,3 to change between the 4 shapes of square, circle and triangle, then you simply match the shapes before they reach the bottom, if they don't match, you lose! be careful, the game isn't as easy as you think except if you play it on easy.
